Name: Continental Exchange
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Sling glass .
Prepare garnish of mint sprig & dehydrated apple slice..
Review: Long and refreshing with subtle flavours of apple, lemon, ginger and plum wine combining well with the cognac base.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Kieran Grieves at Bamboo Door in Sheffield, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Continental Exchange contains 186 calories
